Trait.Name: Angel
Trait.Desc: She is an angel from above.

Trait.Name: Battery Operated
Trait.Desc: She keeps going and going and going... She can never get tired, but she can get hurt or sad.

Trait.Name: Canine
Trait.Desc: This girl is a dog, literally.

Trait.Name: Cat Girl
Trait.Desc: This girl is part feline.

Trait.Name: Construct
Trait.Desc: This girl is not alive or real - she's a machine or has been created with magic. Her health doesn't go down or up quickly. (hard to hurt)

Trait.Name: Cow Girl
Trait.Desc: This girl is part cow.

Trait.Name: Cyclops
Trait.Desc: This girl was born with only one eye.

Trait.Name: Dwarf
Trait.Desc: This girl is extremly short.

Trait.Name: Demon
Trait.Desc: This girl comes from the abyss.

Trait.Name: Different Colored Eyes
Trait.Desc: Her eyes are different colors.

Trait.Name: Dryad
Trait.Desc: This girl has a plant-like body.

Trait.Name: Egg Layer
Trait.Desc: This girl gives birth to eggs instead of live young.

Trait.Name: Elf
Trait.Desc: This girl grew up in the woodlands and has pointy ears.

Trait.Name: Equine
Trait.Desc: This girl has the body of a horse.

Trait.Name: Fallen Goddess
Trait.Desc: She used to be a goddess, until she was stripped of her powers and thrown to the slavers.

Trait.Name: Furry
Trait.Desc: This girl has short soft fur covering most of her body.

Trait.Name: Futanari
Trait.Desc: This girl is a hermaphrodite, by magic or birth. Only a few guys will sleep with her.

Trait.Name: Goddess
Trait.Desc: She's a goddess from above.

Trait.Name: Half-Breed
Trait.Desc: This girl is half human and half... something else.

Trait.Name: Half-Construct
Trait.Desc: This girl has lost a limb, and has a machine or magically animated replacement one. (hard to hurt)

Trait.Name: Incorporeal
Trait.Desc: This girl never gets tired or loses health. (can't get tired or hurt)

Trait.Name: Not Human
Trait.Desc: This girl is not human, which may appeal to some customers.

Trait.Name: Playful Tail
Trait.Desc: This girl has a tail that she can't control.

Trait.Name: Prehensile Tail
Trait.Desc: This girl has a tail that she can use like a third hand.

Trait.Name: Reptilian
Trait.Desc: This girl has a Reptilian body.

Trait.Name: Shape Shifter
Trait.Desc: This girl can change her shape to anything.

Trait.Name: Slitherer
Trait.Desc: This girl has a tail-like appendage instead of legs.

Trait.Name: Solar Powered
Trait.Desc: She needs direct sunlight for a lengthy period to survive.

Trait.Name: Strange Eyes
Trait.Desc: Her eyes are unusual in some way.

Trait.Name: Succubus
Trait.Desc: She is a demon who feeds on sexual energies.

Trait.Name: Wings
Trait.Desc: This girl has wings.
